All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Advance
This class represents the advance order given by the player
AdvanceTest
This class is used to test functionalities of Advance order
Airlift
This class handles the implementation of Airlift card.
AirliftTest
This class tests the airlift model.
Blockade
This class handles the implementation of Blockade card.
BlockadeTest
This class tests the blockade order.
Bomb
This class represents the bomb card given in the game
BombTest
This class is used to test functionality of Bomb class
Card
This class the cards owned by a player
CardTest
This class is used to test functionalities of Card
Command
The Command class processes the command strings entered by the user.
CommonTestSuiteRunner
 
Constants
This class holds constant data members used throughout the application.
Continent
Model class for Continent to store all its information and operations related to continent
ContinentTest
 
Country
 
CountryTest
 
Deploy
This class represents deploy order given by the player
DeployTest
This class tests the functionalities of Deploy class
Diplomacy
Represent the diplomacy command
DiplomacyTest
This class tests the functionalities of Diplomacy class
GameEngine
This is the main controller for the game and will maintain game state, player turns etc.
GameEngineTest
GameEngineTest is used to test all methods of GameEngine class
GameEngineTestSuite
Test suite for Every test cases in Game Engine
GameState
This class is used to store the current state of game.
GameStateTest
 
HelpersTestSuite
Test suit for running all MapHelper and PlayerHelper related tests
InvalidCommand
Command Exceptions are thrown by this class.
InvalidMap
Defined Map Exceptions are thrown by this class.
issueOrderPhase
Represents a phase where players issue orders.
LogEntryBuffer
This Class is used to take the order for notifying the state and get the log message
LogWriterView
This class is used to update the log file whenever there is change in state derived from LogEntryBuffer class
Map
This class manages all the edit operations for the maps and validates the maps.
MapHelper
This class processes the map functions like loading, reading, editing and saving the map.
MapHelperTest
This class tests the operations on map like addition and deletion of countries, continents and neighbors
MapTest
This class tests the functionality of Map module.
MapView
MapView Class handles printing the game state to the console.
MapViewTest
This is test class for MapView Class
ModelsTestSuite
Test suite for testing issue and execution of order functionality and various player services of adding players, assigning armies and countries
Observable
This is class implements notification mechanism when state is changed in game.
Observer
Observer Interface with update method for writing and reading logs of the game
Order
This model manages the orders given in the game by players.
OrderExecutionPhase
 
OrderTest
This class is used to test functionality of Order Class
Phase
This class represents a phase in the game.
Player
This class holds the player's data and issuing the order functionality.
PlayerHelper
This service class handles the players.
PlayerHelperTest
This class is used to test functionalities of PlayerHelper class
PlayerTest
This class tests the sequential execution of orders.
StartUpPhase
This class represents the start-up phase of the game.
